e107Plugin.name: List Latest
e107Plugin.description: This plugin allows you to view a list of recent additions in all e107 categories. You can either view the list with data since your last visit, or view a general latest additions list. Besides the page a menu is also present. Every section is configurable in the admin area.
e107Plugin.copyright: Copyright e107 Inc e107.org, Licensed under GPL (http://www.gnu.org/licenses/gpl.txt)
